places_with_reviews.name: Manihara Mahadev Temple
places_with_reviews.address: 4F2V+34V, Manihara Rd, Maniyara, Baran, Rajasthan 325205, India

reviews.text:
Manihara Mahadev Mandir is a beautiful and peaceful place to visit in Baran. It is a temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, situated near a pond. The temple has a serene atmosphere and offers a glimpse of the local culture and traditions. The temple is well-maintained and clean.
It is a perfect place for prayer and relaxation. I would recommend this temple to anyone who loves nature and spirituality.

It is a Hindu temple.
This is the more beautiful temple of Mahadev (Lord Shiva).
It is a very famous temple in the city of Baran.
It is near a pond. There is a small garden here. All types of facilities are available for the devotees. it is present  in  manihara baran , rajasthan.

One of the picnic spots in baran, have pond , garden, rides for kids, and you can have a birthday or other small celebration there. The Mahadev temple is ancient and its very suitable. If you love to feed fishes in the pond. You can see fishes , turtles and snakes in the pond.

I loved it...
It's a beautiful place for spending time with your loved ones and Devotionaly it make you happy
Good place to visit to fresh your mood😌🙏🏻. This Shiv Tample is wonderful to create inner energy in soul.

places_with_reviews.name: Shri Ji Temple

reviews.text: The temple is about 600 year old. It's a peaceful place , and here you will get to see about 800 year old sculptures of Gods and goddesses that were excavated from nearby area and coins of British era that are embedded in the walls of temple.  famous and must visit temple in Baran city.
Very ancient temple situated in the heart of Baran city, Shri Ji Maharaj fulfills everyone's wishes.

Shree ji temple is one of the most historic and famous hindu temple in Baran city.  This temple is about 1000years old. Daily many local people and tourist visit here for prayer.  On Baran famous DolMela festival God's rath also run from here.
I love 😘
This place is adorable....you can feel relaxed and peace with lots of prayers with lord thakur ji
